verses.verse: And there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4321>Micah<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H517>mother<s%>, The eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> that were <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H422>you<s%>, about which you cursed, and <S%H559>spoke<s%> of also in my <S%H241>ears<s%>, <S%H3701>behold<s%>, the silver is with <S%H3947>me<s%>; I took <S%H517>it<s%>. And his mother <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be you of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And when he had <S%H7725>restored<s%> the eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> to his <S%H517>mother<s%>, his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I had <S%H6942>wholly<s%> <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> a engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> and a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>: now therefore I will restore it unto <S%H7725>you<s%>.

Yet he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> unto his <S%H517>mother<s%>; and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H6884>founder<s%>, who <S%H6213>made<s%> there a engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> and a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>: and they were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4321>Micah<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and <S%H8655>teraphim<s%>, and <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, who became his <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And there was a young <S%H5288>man<s%> out of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem–judah of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, who was a <S%H3881>Levite<s%>, and he stayed <S%H1481>there<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem–judah to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> where he could <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H935>place<s%>: and he came to <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, as he <S%H6213>journeyed<s%>.

And <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H370>him<s%>, From Where <S%H935>come<s%> you And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3881>him<s%>, I am a Levite of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem–judah, and I <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> where I may find a <S%H4672>place<s%>.

And <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3427>him<s%>, Live with <S%H1>me<s%>, and be unto me a father and a <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by the <S%H3117>year<s%>, and a <S%H6187>suit<s%> of <S%H899>apparel<s%>, and your <S%H4241>food<s%>. So the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> went <S%H3212>in<s%>.
And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> with the <S%H376>man<s%>; and the young <S%H5288>man<s%> was unto him as <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.
And <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>; and the young <S%H5288>man<s%> became his <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%>, Now <S%H3045>know<s%> I that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will do me <S%H3190>good<s%>, seeing I have a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> to my <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
